titles.title: A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to maintain the classification of certain airports for fiscal years 2022 and 2023.
Airport Classification Retention Act
Airport Classification Retention Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Airport Classification Retention Act
This bill maintains through FY2023 the classification of any airport that was classified for FY2021 as a nonhub primary airport for purposes of apportioning funds for airport planning and noise compatibility programs.
